channel.title: Poll: Should the Whisker Menu Be Changed? (Aesthetics)
channel.description:
**Should the Whisker Menu Be Changed to look more appealing?**
[poll name=poll2 type=regular results=always public=true chartType=bar] * Yes, I think it should be changed. * No, I prefer it as it is. * I have no strong opinion either way. * I have suggestions for improvements or know a Xfce theme. (Please comment below.) * A different Desktop Environment should replace Xfce (Please comment below.) [/poll]

item.title: Poll: Should the Whisker Menu Be Changed? (Aesthetics)
item.dc:creator: Ashwagandha
item.description:
